statements: SELECT * FROM player_injuries;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM player_injuries WHERE recovery_progress > 0;
SELECT player_id, injury_date FROM player_injuries ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Knee Injury';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_injuries;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, injury_date, recovery_progress FROM player_injuries;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM player_injuries WHERE recovery_progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Knee Injury';
SELECT player_id, injury_date FROM player_injuries ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_injuries, injury_type FROM player_injuries GROUP BY injury_type;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE recovery_status='In Recovery'
SELECT player_id, injury_description FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE recovery_status='On Hold'
SELECT injury_description, recovery_time FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE recovery_status='Recovered'
SELECT player_id, recovery_status FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE recovery_status='In Recovery'
SELECT * FROM InjuryLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE recovery_status='Injured' ORDER BY recovery_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, recovery_status FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE injury_description LIKE '%Fracture%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE recovery_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY player_id, recovery_time ASC;

SELECT player_id, recovery_status, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM PlayerInjuries JOIN InjuryLogs ON PlayerInjuries.player_id = InjuryLogs.player_id GROUP BY player_id, recovery_status HAVING num_logs > 5 ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM recovery_time)) AS avg_recovery_time FROM PlayerInjuries GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_recovery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_status FROM PlayerInjuries ORDER BY injury_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, recovery_status FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE recovery_status='In Recovery';
SELECT recovery_id, player_id, progress_percentage FROM RecoveryProgress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT simulation_id, player_id, simulation_result FROM ARSimulation WHERE simulation_date >= '2022-01-01' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE injury_type = 'Knee Injury' ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, recovery_status FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT simulation_result FROM ARSimulation WHERE player_id = 2002 AND simulation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT player_id, recovery_date, progress_percentage FROM RecoveryProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY recovery_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_simulations FROM ARSimulation GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_simulations > 5;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, age FROM Player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, age FROM Player WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT player_name, injury_type, recovery_status FROM Player JOIN Injury ON Player.player_id = Injury.player_id WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain';
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE age > 25;
SELECT player_name, age FROM Player WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name, injury_type FROM Player INNER JOIN Injury ON Player.player_id = Injury.player_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM Player INNER JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_name, recovery_date, recovery_notes FROM Player INNER JOIN Injury ON Player.player_id = Injury.player_id INNER JOIN RecoveryProgress ON Injury.injury_id = RecoveryProgress.injury_id;
SELECT * FROM players
SELECT player_id, player_name, age FROM players
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_id FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM teams
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT * FROM players WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY player_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_name, age, team_id, injury_status FROM players WHERE team_id = 2 AND (age < 30 OR injury_status = 'Active')

SELECT p.player_name, t.team_name, i.injury_type FROM players p INNER JOIN teams t ON p.team_id = t.team_id LEFT JOIN injuries i ON p.player_id = i.player_id WHERE i.injury_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.player_name DESC, i.injury_type
SELECT player_name, recovery_progress FROM players WHERE recovery_progress >= 50 AND recovery_progress < 100 ORDER BY recovery_progress DESC
SELECT p.player_name, r.recovery_date, r.recovery_status FROM players p JOIN recovery_logs r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE r.recovery_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY r.recovery_date ASC
